modName: Sadie Follower-HDT Animated Vagina-UUNP ONLY Standalone
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]
[color=#00ffff]

Thanks Everyone!
[URL=http://funkyimg.com/view/2v16o][IMG]http://funkyimg.com/i/2v16o.png[/IMG][/URL]

Sadie has an animated vagina so if you have SexLab installed you are good to go and if not you'll have to Google it. The sweaty version of the skin was used because as we know climbing up the snowy cold terrain to Throat Of The World will make you sweat. :p Sadie is trained in three combat areas that I like to stick to. Melee, Ranged and Magic. She can be found in Riverwood at the Inn. If you like hit the Endorse button and thanks![/color][/size][color=#00ffff]

[size=3]Note: I will NOT be doing CBBE versions anymore since I have no way to troubleshoot meshes and textures unless I uninstall UNP and that isn't going to happen![/size]

[/color][size=3][color=#00ffff]Height: .98 Weight: .60

Weapons: 2 Ebony enchanted (fire) daggers.

Armor: Non so she is ready to equip with the armor or your choice.

Health, Magica and Stamina 500

Can Marry her.

NON-ESSENTIAL

Set not to bleed.

Spells: Firebolt and Healing

What do I need to get her like your screenshots?[/color]

[color=#00ffff]ENBSeries by: Boris Vorontsov [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]ENBSeries[/url][/size]
